meanings.definition: Make changes in something established, especially by introducing new methods or ideas.
meanings.sent1: The company is innovating its products to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys innovating her artwork to keep it fresh and exciting.
meanings.sent3: The chef was innovating with unusual ingredients, creating a dish that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: By innovating the traditional teaching methods, the educator sparked a new interest in the students.
meanings.sent5: Innovating the way we communicate can lead to better connections and understanding.

meanings.definition: Introduce something new; make changes in anything established.
meanings.sent1: The team is innovating a new strategy to improve their performance.
meanings.sent2: He is constantly innovating his wardrobe with trendy pieces.
meanings.sent3: The magician was innovating his tricks, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: By innovating the menu, the restaurant attracted a wider range of customers.
meanings.sent5: Innovating the design of the building made it more functional and appealing.
